title: Color Mage
description: Lord Callo, bastard son of the King's sister, leaves his holdings in the midst of the contempt of his friends. He joins Healer Kirian as she flees for her life from the anger of a Collared Lord. Together they journey to Ha'las -- an enemy island ruled by the feared and despised psychic mages known as ku'an.There, Callo learns of his true heritage -- and finds that great power is his birthright. All he has to do is sacrifice everything he has ever stood for.Can he keep Kirian safe in a land where women are kept hidden and restricted? Can he protect her from his own dangerous magery? And why are the Kings of two nations seeking to use him as a tool for their own political ends?
author: Anne Marie Lutz
